DOC.brief_summary: Aim : To evaluate compare effectiveness combine treatment TENS Elec-tromagnetic Back School effectiveness Back School treatment . Design : Single-blind experimental prospective study clinic intervention . Setting : Physiotherapy Speech Therapy Unit Cambrils Slight Hospital . Spain . Population : 96 woman ( 50-85 year ) chronic low back pathology . Methods : Subjects divide three randomize group : Back School ( group 1 ) , TENS Back School ( group 2 ) , Magnetic therapy Back School ( group 3 ) . They re-ceived 20 session treatment . The intensity pain ( EVA Scale ) quality life ( Oswestry Scale ) measure , begin end treatment three six month . Anthropometric physical activity variable collect .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Physiotherapy Treatments Low Back Pain Women .
DOC.criteria: Women 50 85 year . Chronic LBP condition least three month ago . Patient 's agreement signing consent . Cardiac pacemaker carrier . Patients part osteosynthesis / prosthesis . Patients well balance medical condition . Patients TENS home / complete physiotherapy last three month . Patients skin infectious disease skin lesion / area hypoesthesia . Patients malignant tumour . Patients receive spinal injection last six week . Patients participate participate study last three month
